property.name: Objective type
property.description: Type of objective that was used for the reconstruction such as dry, oil or water.

property.name: Orientation of reconstruction
property.description: Orientation of reconstruction refers to the rotation applied to the cell reconstruction, expected value : X-Y rotated.

property.name: Reconstruction compression corrected
property.description: Reconstruction compression corrected refers to the correction applied to the cell reconstruction, expected value : x1.25 in Z.

property.name: Reconstruction completed
property.description: Reconstruction completed indicates if the cell reconstruction has been completed.

property.name: Reconstruction corrected
property.description: Reconstruction corrected indicates if the cell reconstruction has been corrected.

property.name: Reconstruction comment
property.description: Reconstruction comment gives any additional information on the cell reconstruction process.

property.name: Cluster reconstruction requested
property.description: Cluster reconstruction requested indicates if the reconstruction is to be done in a cluster of cells.

property.name: Reconstruction requester
property.description: Person who requested the cell reconstruction

property.name: Reconstruction sent date
property.description: Reconstruction sent date is the date at which the reconstruction request was sent.

property.name: Reconstruction date
property.description: Reconstruction date is the date at which the reconstruction done.

property.name: Reconstruction location
property.description: Reconstruction location indicates the organization where the reconstruction is done.
The labeled cell used for the reconstruction activity
